thread.title: Trump promises spending cuts in White House budget meeting
thread.title_full: Trump promises spending cuts in White House budget meeting

author: Robert Barnes
title: Trump promises spending cuts in White House budget meeting
text: Trump promises spending cuts in White House budget meeting   President Trump said his administration is “going to be spending the money in a very, very careful manner," promising spending cuts during a budget meeting on Feb. 22 at the White House. ( ) RELATED LINKS - President Trump said his administration is “going to be spending the money in a very, very careful manner," promising spending cuts during a budget meeting on Feb. 22 at the White House.
